entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is described as a state-of-the-art racing broom with advanced features such as a streamlined handle, aerodynamic perfection, and an unbreakable Braking Charm. (Excerpt: 'THE FIREBOLT / This state-of-the-art racing broom sports a stream-lined, superﬁne handle of ash...')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who wants to buy the Firebolt and has a good broom already. (Excerpt: 'He had never wanted anything / ... but he had never lost a Quidditch match on his Nimbus Two Thousand...')

entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: The Nimbus Two Thousand is mentioned as Harry's current broom. (Excerpt: 'He had never lost a Quidditch match on his Nimbus Two Thousand...')

entities.name: gringotts vault
entities.description: Gringotts vault is mentioned as Harry's bank account where he keeps his gold. (Excerpt: 'He had never wanted anything / ... when he had a very good broom already? Harry')

relationships.description: Harry desires to buy the Firebolt. (Excerpt: 'He had never wanted anything / ... as much in his whole life — but he had never lost a Quidditch match on his Nimbus Two Thousand...')
Harry owns the Nimbus Two Thousand. (Excerpt: 'He had never lost a Quidditch match on his Nimbus Two Thousand...')
Harry has gold in the Gringotts vault. (Excerpt: 'He had never wanted anything / ... when he had a very good broom already? Harry')
